name: AYCE (Benjamin, uelen)
description:
On board the Matrix, a Salem class containment cruiser, a demonic presence released several abominations and started a riot. You are one such abomination, bound for some remote planet in the 3b1b system.

To get there alive you’ll need to:
  • Feed on your fellow freaks.
  • Rip out some of your many spines with [Left Click] or [RT] to subdue your foes, this comes at a cost.
  • Engulf them with your tendrils to C O N S U M E them.
  • Deftly dash out of danger with [Left Shift] or [LT].
  • Bash the rats, hexapods, and mages with [Right Click] or [RB].
  • Keep an eye on your meater or you might meat your end.
